colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(RGYA GAR MKHAN PO SU RAN DRA BODDHI DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA BARnA DE ZHANG YE SHES SDES BSGYUR CING ZHUS NAS SKAD @004B GSAR CHAD KYIS KYANG BSNAN NAS GTAN LA PHAB BO, MNYAM MED DREN CAN BCOM LDAN GSUNG BYIN GYIS, BAG MED NYAM CHUNG BYIS PA'I TSOGS RNAMS KUN, TSOGS MED PA YANG MI RTAG DON RIG NAS, BSLU MED GTAN GYI BDE LA 'DUN GYUR CIG ,SMON LAM RNAM PAR DAG PA'O, ,DGE'O,)
translator_(орчуулагч): SU RAN DRA BODDHI, YE SHES SDE,
